name: Unnamed Horror
description:
Ever been in a horror movie? No? Well, you have landed on the right spot. Try out this game and find out for yourself.

**This game is currently under development in the initial stages and isn't meant for public use yet.**

Pro Tips:

Follow the star by using the path with less bushes/trees and always try to find a device which can emit lights (eg. torch, switches which turn on lights).

Controls:

WASD - Movement

E - Interact

Left click - Open doors

Made By Sandeep Pani.
